Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Astros will host the Detroit Tigers in the second game of the AL Wild Card Series on Wednesday at 2:32 p.m. ET, live on ABC from Minute Maid Park.
Hunter Brown is starting for the Astros and Tyler Holton is set to start for the Tigers.
The Astros have a collective 9.3 K/9, the third-best in the majors, while the Tigers have an 8.4 K/9 this season, ranking 21st in the majors.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the second matchup in the AL Wild Card Series.
The Astros and Tigers are competing for advancement in the postseason.
Others: The game can be live streamed on Fubo.
The Tigers and Astros are set to face off in a high-stakes playoff matchup.
